name: CHEXS
description: CHEXS is an evolution of chess, a new take on the old classic. It is a strategy game played on a hexagonal board where both sides move all of its pieces within a single turn, then all movements are solved simultaneusly.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible sound card
